subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: A day that began with the glamour threesome of Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson and Adam Scott ended with the 608th-ranked Kevin Streelman and the 722nd-ranked Justin Hicks in the lead.
snippet: A day that began with the glamour threesome of Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson and Adam Scott ended with the 608th-ranked Kevin Streelman and the 722nd-ranked Justin Hicks in the lead.
